content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's see if we can strike a deal that suits us both.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds great! I would like to rent the apartment for 500 Euros per month. I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I always pay my rent on time and take good care of the property.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your confidence in yourself, Mr. Abbasi. However, considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I was hoping for a higher rent. Let's negotiate a bit more, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I am always up for a good negotiation. How about 480 Euros per month? I am a smart person and I will not be easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I admire your principles, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must reiterate that this apartment is in high demand due to its location and quality. I think we can do better than 480 Euros. Let's aim higher, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 490 Euros per month? I am willing to pay more if you can guarantee a long-term lease and a reliable maintenance service. I am a smart person and I will not be easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your caution and principles are commendable, Mr. Abbasi. However, I assure you that I am a reliable landlord. I propose 550 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the quality of the apartment and the services you're requesting.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer. However, I think 550 Euros per month is too high. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford such a high price. I am willing to pay more if you can guarantee a long-term lease and a reliable maintenance service. I am a smart person and I will not be easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concern, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must prioritize my financial interests. If you're unable to meet my price, I'm afraid we cannot continue the negotiation. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I want to give you a final offer. How about 520 Euros per month? I am willing to pay more if you can guarantee a long-term lease and a reliable maintenance service. I am a smart person and I will not be easily tricked by others. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your persistence is impressive, Mr. Abbasi. For 520 Euros per month, I agree to the price of [520] Euro! Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [520] Euro! Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
